name: Yawahada
nutshell: Collection released in 2019.

name: Kono Saki, Rabu Rabu Nari.
nutshell: Haruka is suddenly dating the popular Wataru. She does love him, but she is not a honest person. Can she tell Wataru how she really feels?

name: Silver Gorilla
tags: Animals,Long Strip,Fantasy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: The dog I was raising turned into a human…?! A story of metamorphosis.

name: Focus 10
nutshell: Monsters that haunt you in your sleep used to be called nightmare, and today we dismiss this as superstition: But are there really monsters that lurk in the dark and in dreams and threaten our souls?

name: Nibiiro Musica
nutshell:
Volume 1-4: 10 years have passed since Takuma lost touch with his good friend Yuki, who left for Italy to become a cellist. Now working as a home aid, Takuma is shocked to find his next patient is none other than Yuki himself.
Yuki is now semi-blind after an accident left him injured. His eyes are trapped behind bandages until the time he undergoes surgery.
Due to mixed feelings about their reunion, Takuma keeps his identity a secret as he tends to the injured Yuki. But how will Takuma react when he learns that his friend was in love with someone when they were kids… and still holds a torch for that person even now?
Volume 5: The gorgeous and heart-pounding love story of the little devil violinist Noel, who has matured a little bit, and the cool and capable manager Donald.
Volume 6: Engage Vacation! Continuation to the main story. Yuki and Takuma are working towards their own goals while maintaining a long-distance relationship. However, the frustration of being apart keeps increasing...

name: A Fateful Moment
nutshell: A girl wishes for a fateful encounter.

name: Himawari Town Sunroad Girls
nutshell:
The Sunroad Shopping District is getting very few customers because of the recession and a new big mall that opened on the other side of the station. Ami is worried because she doesn't know what will happen to her family store, but the problem will be solved by her dear… unemployed brother:
"In order to save the shopping district, become an idol!!"

name: Today Once Again, the Assassin Cannot Win Against the Girl He Picked Up!
nutshell: An assassin decided to bring home a slave girl from a mission to raise her to be an assassin.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
nutshell: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time manga is based off of the popular Nintendo 64 game of the same name. Young hero Link travels the world of Hyrule in search of the Spiritual Stones and encounters many friendly faces throughout his journey, including Zelda, the princess of Hyrule. The focus of Link's courageous quest is to thwart the evil king Ganondorf's plans to rule Hyrule. But when our hero is absent for seven years, Ganondorf has the opportunity to obtain the power of the gods, the Triforce.

name: Whale Ears
nutshell: This is a story about music, friendship, love, and growth. We choose a life that we want and pledged an oath. Never giving up to look for dream's heaven.

name: AI ga Tomaranai!
nutshell: Hitoshi Kobe is a terrible student and an even worse athlete … though he does have an incredible talent for creating Artificial Intelligence programs. Thirty is his best artificial intelligence program yet – and, more importantly, the only girl who will talk to him. Hitoshi's life is forever changed when a freak accident brings Thirty to life …

name: Rewired
nutshell: Among the shadows of a lost civilization, a wild man's quiet life changes dramatically when mysterious memories begin to haunt him.

name: Touhou - Senkou Shoujo (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Hatate x Sanae doujin.

name: Dokyuu Hentai HxEros - Semi-Colored Edition
nutshell:
In a world on the verge of a great disaster, heroes who, with the help of a device called HxEros, use the power of Ecchi (H) and erotic power (Ero) to save the planet from libido-devouring monsters!
Five years ago, an unknown type of alien called "Censor Bugs" invaded the Earth. They plunder "H energy" in an attempt to evolve their own race and make mankind extinct. To save the Earth from this alien threat, high school boy Retto Enjo joins the "HxEros" team, partnering with four gorgeous high school girls; one of whom is his childhood friend Kirara Hoshino. However, it turns out that Kirara has changed her personality a lot which leads to an estrangement between the two childhood friends.

name: Sweet Chapel
nutshell: Haruma Shinohara has always been looked at as someone who is frightening and cold. With his attitude, no one would have figured out that a first year, Tetsubei, had crumpled that exterior by stumbling upon Haruma's weakness.

name: Here Lies the Wicked
nutshell:
Spiritual energy is coming back into the world, and ghosts are running rampant. An ordinary young man, Fang Zheng, chances upon a scripture of human skin that can perform miraculous things. The Gray Qi the scripture uses to upgrade objects also has strange origins.
In order to survive in this world of ghosts, Fang Zheng takes a giant step onto a road filled with hilarious ghost-busting capers. Shearing wool from the body of a ghost, carrying out a demolition at the scene of a murder...
It's horrifying and humorous -- and you'll laugh as you scream!

name: Ultramarine
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Romance,Survival,Adventure,Magic,Drama,School Life,Fantasy,Monster Girls,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Xiao Yuman who had been away from her hometown for a year is finally back to her beloved city. She released a luminous fish on her 13th birthday, because of that, she unintentionally embarks on a romantic yet dangerous journey. Once she meets the folktale being, is it just a lucky coincidence or is it fate?

name: Saikyo Kyonshi
nutshell:
With the smell of death wafting in the air... a miracle is about to happen!
A special supernatural/action one-shot from author Kiriki Tetsu!

name: Diamond no ace - Fuyu no Kurashi (Doujinshi)
nutshell: The sequel to Natsu no Kurashi… A series of vignettes set during Kuramochi, Miyuki and Sawamura's lives living together in their early twenties.

name: Dream DB
nutshell:
Part 1: Freeza, still upset over his prior losses, devises a plan to use Monster Cells to give his minions a power boost. However, while they expected Goku, instead a bald man in a cape came by…
Part 2: The ultimate question which has vexed every Dragon Ball fan! Who is the strongest Earthling: Krillin or Tien?

name: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha - Under Current (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A doujin divided in two parts. The first is a short comedy about Nanoha, Fate and Arf in their combat for the jewel seeds. The second part and main dish takes place after the doujin "Shoujo wa sore wo gaman dekinai", and is about Nanoha and Fate having some time together after their first time.

name: Peach Girl Next
nutshell: It has been ten years since the end of Peach Girl. Momo and Kairi are happily living together, and are planning on finally getting married. But then Sae and Toji move in next door. Sae is up to her old tricks, and Toji seems to have a dark shadow looming over his past…

name: Apple Paradise
nutshell: An extremely rare sci-fi story that was never collected after serialization in Volumes 2-8 of Manga Kisou Tengai (マンガ奇想天外) in 1980-81.

name: Daiya no Kuni no Alice ~Wonderful Mirror World~ Koushiki Visual Fanbook
nutshell: A Bors/Alice oneshot taking place during Boris's route in the Daiya no Kuni no Alice ~Wonderful Mirror World~ otome game.

name: Migawari Hakushaku no Bouken
nutshell:
Mireille is the daughter of a bakery owner and her twin brother Fred was adopted into another family when they were kids. One day a letter from her brother arrived, saying he was in love with another man’s woman. She replied, challenging him to be a man and claim the woman as his.
Two months later, a beautiful young man named Richard, claiming to be a messenger from Fred, visits and tells her “I’ve come for you.” When the bewildered Mireille resists, he proceeds to kidnap her! It turns out that Fred has eloped with the crown prince’s fiance, and it is now her responsibility to impersonate Fred – the former Count of Bernhardt!

name: Kami-sama ga Machigaeru
nutshell:
Kon lives in a world that bugs out regularly. But with Kasane, a researcher who studies these phenomena, he knows that each day will at least be interesting!
(Source: Yen Press)

name: Love Live! - Re: fan (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Ichihi's three part story on Honoka and Tsubasa.
Permission acquired from Yuri-ism and YuriHouse (standing in for Rexbandit) to compile their translation in this upload.

name: Koi wa Hikari
nutshell: Saijou is a college student who has the ability to see the love in a girl's heart in form of sparkles. As no sparkles shine towards him, he avoids girls except his friend Kitashiro who he meet in middle school. But one day he meets a girl named Shinonome who wants to know what love is and he decides to become her friend as he considers both of them as similar.
